#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define ll long long
#define limit (ll) 1e7
int P[limit+1];
int count=0;
 
void gen()
{
  memset(P,0,sizeof(P));
  P[0]=-1,P[1]=-1;
  ll k=0,i,j;
  for(i=2;i<=limit;i++)
  {
     if(P[i]==0)
     {
        P[i]=++k;
        for(j=i*i;j<=limit;j+=i)
           P[j]=-1;
     }
  }
}
 
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    gen();
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
          scanf("%d",&n);
          printf("%d\n",P[n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
